arts.ttl: Stoke edge past Portsmouth after late own goal
arts.sum: Portsmouth defender Hayden Matthews scored a second half own goal to gift Stoke a much-needed 1-0 win at Fratton Park.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Stoke - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Portsmouth and Stoke City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Stoke predictions: Potters to craft another low-scoring success
arts.sum: Fratton Park is the venue as Portsmouth host Stoke in a Saturday lunchtime clash in the Championship and Enda McElhinney reckons the visitors can nick all three points.

arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 12
arts.sum: James Mason has picked out a score prediction for all 12 Championship fixtures taking place this weekend.
